sentences.sentence: According to the Hamas-run health ministry in the besieged territory, the Israeli military campaign has killed 10,569 people, many of them children. The pace of Palestinian civilians fleeing south from northern Gaza has accelerated as strikes intensified. Crowds of Palestinians took heed of Israeli military orders and fled northern Gaza on Wednesday during a four-hour window to evacuate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Thousands of people walked down Gaza's main north-south Salah al-Din highway with only what they could carry in their arms, some of them holding makeshift white flags.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Ukraine is one step closer to joining the European Union.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The European Commission has recommended member states formally open accession talks with Kyiv.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Although outstanding work on fundamental reforms needs to be met in the coming months, nonetheless, the President of the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen, said today was a historical day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It is now ten years ago that the protests on Maidan started.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Maidan protests where people were shot because they wrapped themselves into a European flag. And now, ten years later, today is a historic day because today the Commission recommends that the Council opens accession negotiations with Ukraine and with Moldova.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: In a 150-page assessment, the EU says Ukraine has made significant progress in tackling corruption, the influence of oligarchs on political life, the rights of minorities and the independence of the judicial system, although some more work is required in these areas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Speaking to Euronews, Ukrainian Deputy Prime Minister said these issues will be resolved soon and oligarchs would no longer be a problem in ukraine experts and the leaders of opinion has said oligarchs are officially dead not from the physical point of view but as a um as as a creation of the post-sooviet transition period. So there are many things to be accomplished, but basically we have been recognized as a country which has overcame this influence and there is no way back.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The EU strongly commended Ukraine's progress in the midst of the Russian invasion of their country, which created the momentum for theirs and Moldova's membership bid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: All 27 member states have to unanimously agreed to move Ukraine to accession talks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: If all goes to plan, a timeline for starting negotiations would then emerge for early 2024.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Shona Murray, Euronews, Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: A copy of the first folio of Shakespeare's plays goes on display in London as Britain and the world marks the 400th anniversary of its publication.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The copy put on display at the Corporation of London's Guildhall Library for one day only, is one of the best-preserved versions of the folio. The anniversary of the publication, on 8th November 1623, has also been celebrated by sending a weather balloon into space, carrying a portrait of the English playwright and a speech from A Midsummer Night's Dream.
